ch.rabanti.nanoxlsx4j.style

Class Font

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.rabanti.nanoxlsx4j.style.AbstractStyle
      • ch.rabanti.nanoxlsx4j.style.Font
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<AbstractStyle>

    public class Font
extends AbstractStyle
    Class representing a Font entry. The Font entry is used to define text formatting
    Author:
    Raphael Stoeckli
